titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Hezekiah Williams and Mary Gardner marriage certificate 1977.103
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-25 13:41:36 +0000.

did.unittitle: Hezekiah Williams and Mary Gardner marriage certificate
did.abstract: Marriage certificate of Hezekiah Williams and Mary Gardner of Troy, New York, dated September 7, 1809. The certificate is signed by both Williams and Gardner, as well as several witnesses to the wedding ceremony. Williams and Gardner were both Quakers.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Hezekiah Williams and Mary Gardner marriage certificate, 1977.103, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
